medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Yesterday, the patient started to have crampy abdominal pain, which was diffuse, along with episodes of nausea and vomiting. The patient had multiple loose bowel movements (approximately 7) yesterday. Today, he was febrile and complained of significant abdominal pain. He was transferred to a facility for further management after a chest X-ray showed free air.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Remote history of duodenal ulcer, treated with Tegamet, symptoms improved. No other past medical history or surgeries mentioned.
